synopsis.text:
There exists a tumultuous era where seven celestial warriors, the Hokushintenkun, emerge as beacons of hope amidst the chaos. Among these, two opposing forces, the North Star Tonrou and the South Star Hagun, are fated to clash, despite their coexistence being an impossibility. Taito, an unsuspecting swordsman, is chosen as the Hagun and is thrust into a battle against the Tonrou to fulfill the destiny of the Stars.

In the Ken Empire, tyranny reigns supreme under the deranged Lord Keiro, the Shogun of the Imperial Army. In his maniacal pursuit of a divine sword, Keiro leaves a bloody trail of devastation. Standing against him is Taito, a reincarnated celestial being who vows to avenge the innocent lives lost to Keiro's ruthless ambition. Taito's newfound cosmic powers draw him into an inevitable confrontation with Keiro, but harnessing them without guidance could unravel his very existence. To become a heroic martial artist and master his abilities, Taito must seek the wisdom of fellow star-born warriors who share his mission to overthrow the corrupt empire.

The seven stars of destiny illuminate the sky, each connected to a formidable champion. Among these, the North Star Tonrou and the South Star Hagun burn the brightest, destined to engage in a catastrophic battle. To prevent the chaos that would ensue, the remaining five stars unite to intervene.
